title: ‘Someone show this to Beto’: Heritage Foundation’s Amy Swearer delivers ‘the best ‘ban assault weapons’ rebuttal I’ve ever seen’ [video]
text:
Earlier, Heritage Foundation senior legal policy analyst Amy Swearer testified before the House Judiciary Committee regarding assault weapons. And if you’re looking for a thoughtful, reasonable, and knowledgeable take on the importance of preserving Americans’ access to so-called “assault weapons,” look no further than this:

.@AmySwearer delivering basic facts about how Americans use firearms to @HouseJudiciary in their hearing on "assault weapons" is the dopamine hit I didn't know I needed—but I wasn't expecting the story about her mom. If #2A twitter doesn't know who Amy is yet they should today. pic.twitter.com/Aw3Fl1mFOa — Lyndsey Fifield (@lyndseyfifield) September 25, 2019

Wait for the ending: Conservatives have been struggling for years to answer the left’s question “why does anyone NEED an AR-15?” and @AmySwearer not only made it clear and easy to understand—she was KIND to those who don’t get it. No dunking needed. https://t.co/p2663FqLzh — Lyndsey Fifield (@lyndseyfifield) September 25, 2019

Absolutely fantastic.

Wow! She was great! — Dolly Davenport (@2bSerious) September 25, 2019

Epic testimony! Epic! — Mathieu Guillet (@mathieu_guillet) September 25, 2019

Eloquent, respectful, and factual (as always). Excellent job, @AmySwearer! — Steve Culy (@charcware) September 25, 2019

That was my favorite part. No boomer memes. Just the simple explanation that AR15s are far easy for the avg person to use in normal conditions which translates to easier use in a stressful situation. — Gregg (@greekkid31) September 25, 2019

Thank you Amy of Heritage so eloquently defending our second amendment rights. Only two pro gun witnesses were allowed on the panel. Both of them are women. pic.twitter.com/gp7Dx4WcnN — Antonia Okafor (@antonia_okafor) September 25, 2019

@AmySwearer fighting for all of us on the hill today. She remains a powerful force with @Heritage and is a very strong ally in our fight on Capitol Hill. Allies on all levels. https://t.co/KGPO7KWvjJ — Exposing Gun Control (@XposeGunControl) September 25, 2019

@AmySwearer absolutely crushes it in this testimony. Listen and bask in the rays of this awesome rebuke https://t.co/vFc8AUrf2K — John “The Saint” Dillinger (@Dillingersays) September 25, 2019

This is the best "ban assault weapons" rebuttal I've ever seen. Well done. Someone show this to Beto. https://t.co/yNsUM85vqi — Cody (@Cody_from_Iowa) September 25, 2019

HOLY COW!!! Amy, this is the first Ive ever heard of you, thank Lyndsey for the video. Amy, you absolutely crushed it. Thank you for being a great voice for #2A — Gregg (@greekkid31) September 25, 2019
